entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
